title: Business Controller
description:
Business Controller – Industrial Solutions | Walloon Brabant




Our client, an established international company in the industrial and sustainable technologies sector is looking for a Business Controller to support its operational and strategic finance activities from its site in Walloon Brabant.




Your role:




Working closely with senior leadership, you’ll act as a financial business partner across multiple departments, ensuring data-driven decisions, resource allocation, and long-term planning.




Your key responsibilities will include:




 * Reviewing financial results and performance indicators
 * Identifying variances and recommending corrective actions
 * Supporting strategic initiatives and investment evaluations
 * Preparing annual budgets, rolling forecasts, and multi-year financial plans
 * Enhancing reporting processes and delivering actionable insights
 * Collaborating cross-functionally with finance, operations, and shared services
 * Supporting the deployment of financial tools and training business users




What we’re looking for:




 * Master's degree in Finance, Economics, or Business
 * Between 3 to 5 years of relevant experience in financial analysis or controlling
 * Fluency in French and English (Dutch is a plus)
 * Strong analytical mindset and business sense
 * Proficient with Excel and experience with ERP systems (SAP is a plus)
 * Proactive, structured, and confident in communicating with stakeholders




What’s on offer:




 * Competitive salary up to €70,000 per year, depending on experience
 * Comprehensive benefits package
 * Hybrid working model with several days per week on site
 * A purpose-driven environment where sustainability and innovation are central
 * Opportunities for personal and professional development in a growing international group







Location: Walloon Brabant (hybrid)
sector: Industrial Machinery Manufacturing, Construction, and Wholesale Building Materials
